name: Macchiato
info: A Sinner who is adept at supporting allies. Increases Energy Recovery Speed by 10%.
criminalRecord:
Allows and assists people in their strange indulgences, and abuses powers in attracting elites to participate in illegal gatherings for money. Worsens Eastside's crime-filled atmosphere as a terrible influence on the city.

--

It's stated in the file that multiple individuals involved in the illegal gatherings have a history of sexual harassment and assault, which matches the subject's statement. It's believed that after her special power awakened, the subject was unable to leave the fetish club due to the nature of her power, so she was essentially coerced into participation.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary
Those who get whipped will have their brain activities and hormones controlled. The ability is known to be useless against Macchiato, and can only be used on others.

+++* Awakening Signs
Out of self-defense in the face of the boss's blatant harassment, her special power awakened.

+++* Corruption State
Having never contracted with the source, she was in an early stage of Mania before the awakening. No visible signs, and no long-term mental damage has been observed.
ecbFlavourText: "I think... I'm used to it already."
arrestRec1: A new club suddenly went up the ranks in Eastside, and was investigated by the Bureau for unclear business content. The place was immediately trashed when it was found to be an illegal assembly led by Sinners. Macchiato was arrested for being "The-One-and-Only Designated Queen of the Club".
arrestRec2: Her family was not well-off, and had a lot of kids. After graduating from college, she worked at Eastside Bank as a clerk, sending most of her measly income back to her home.
arrestRec3: To get a raise, she worked very hard. But her gender and her looks led to a lot of gossip and prejudice, which led to her losing opportunities of promotion. Not only that, but she was also harassed by her male bosses.
arrestRec4: Her special power awakened when she resisted harassment from her boss, but this unexpectedly brought pleasure to the aggressor. Tempted by the boss's offer to "conceal her identity as a Sinner" and "promote her and give her a raise", Macchiato reluctantly agrees to work as "Queen" at the club he recommended.
servingTerm1: The subject does not enjoy the act of whipping others. Out of combat, she hides the whip somewhere less obvious. She tried changing weapons, but gave up as no other weapon came close to the efficiency of the whip in using her special powers.
servingTerm2: Allowed to retain contact with her family in Eastside. She cares a lot about her parents' health and her siblings' academic results, and lied that she was assigned to a faraway branch, keeping them away from the truth.
servingTerm3: Needs and craves money. When rich Sinners walk past her, her jealousy can be observed. Yet when offered a direct charity, Macchiato would turn down the offer, or make a counter offer where she earns the profit.
servingTerm4: Holds appreciation for the Chief for releasing her from the club. She may not like being a "Queen", but if the Chief requests it, she will gladly oblige. And in that process, she comes to understand the fun of the business.

**Chief:** â€¦â€¦

supervision1:
++* âš  Childhood Game

//Playing spinning tops suddenly became a trend in the Bureau.//

**System Notifications:** There has been a trend of nostalgic sports going on in the Bureau. The other Sinners made Macchiato play spinning tops with them. Quite unexpectedly, she was completely unable to master this game.

* **Prompt:** I don't understand it.
supervision2:
++* âš  Graduation Photo

//Macchiato looks very happy.//

**System Notifications:** Today, Macchiato showed you her younger brother's graduation photo. On the photo was a boy in academic dress, with a big smile on his face.

* **Prompt:** Wish him all the best
supervision3:
++* âš  Improving Durability

//You hear the sound of intense lashing coming from the Training Room.//

**System Notifications:** Macchiato's lash broke in the training.

* **Prompt:** Buy new gears
supervision4:
++* âš  Popular Player

//The combat training has been going wild lately.//

**System Notifications:** Whenever the Sinners have to pick their training partner, Macchiato is always everyone's go-to choice.

* **Prompt:** Understandable
supervision5:
++* âš âš  About the Full Auto Lash

//Chief, you have a new request.//

**System Notifications:** Chief, you have a new request.

**Macchiato:** Chief, may I ask you to upgrade my weapon?

**Chief:** What kind of upgrade are we talking about?

**Macchiato:** Do you have a full auto lash?

**Macchiato:** The kind of lash that will move by itself when you're holding it.

**Macchiato:** Using a lash can be exhausting. After every mission, my hand and arm gets all sore and numb for three days.

**Chief:** ...

**Chief:** I think I might as well get you a remote control lash so you don't even have to be there anymore. What do you think?

**Macchiato:** That'd be lovely!

**Macchiato:** What would I do without you, Chief?

**Chief:** ...

* **Prompt:** I can't believe you took that seriously...
* **Prompt:** Time to wake up.

**Chief:** We'll double the physiques training, starting tomorrow.
supervision6:
++* âš âš  Ill Behavior

//Warning. Macchiato the Sinner is making illegal trades.//

**System Notifications:** Warning. Macchiato the Sinner is making illegal trades. Would you like to summon this Sinner?

* **Prompt:** Yes

**Macchiato:** Chief, you want to see me?

* **Prompt:** You don't know?
* **Prompt:** You are making illegal trades.

**Chief:** You have been sneaking around in the Outdoor Activity Area these few days. What are you up to?

**Macchiato:** Someone paid me to whip him...

**Macchiato:** I didn't want to do it, but the offer was too good for me to turn down.

**Chief:** You should know that such behaviors are strictly prohibited in the Bureau. It's not a matter of how much money you are being offered.

**Macchiato:** Yes... Chief. I'm sorry.

**Chief:** If I catch you again, you will face punishment.
supervision7:
++* âš âš  The Struggles of a Parent

//Warning. Macchiato the Sinner is experiencing unstable emotions.//

**System Notifications:** Warning. Macchiato the Sinner is experiencing unstable emotions. Go check on her.

**Chief:** Macchiato, your emotions had always been stable. What happened today?

**Macchiato:** Sigh. Chief, have you ever needed to look after children or younger siblings?

* **Prompt:** No...
* **Prompt:** Even if I did, I don't recall anything.

**Macchiato:** I thought as much. Chief, I guess you'll never understand my struggles.

**Chief:** What's wrong?

**Macchiato:** This morning, I received a call from my family. My father told me my younger sister had a crush, but she is still so young! It's already distracting her from studying!

**Macchiato:** I asked her to speak to me over the phone, but we quarreled! And then, she hung up on me!

**Macchiato:** This is infuriating!

**Chief:** ...

**Chief:** I don't know what that must feel like, but it is suffocating enough just to hear you describe it.
supervision8:
++* âš âš âš  Breadwinner

//Macchiato has sent you a request to increase her workload.//

**System Notifications:** New request from Sinner Macchiato. Please confirm.

**Macchiato:** Chief, could you assign more work to me?

**Chief:** Why?

**Macchiato:** I'll be honest with you. I have a bunch of younger siblings to feed at home, and my parents depend on me financially.

**Macchiato:** Ever since coming to the MBCC, my income has almost been cut by half... I can't quite cover their expenses now.

**Macchiato:** I'd like to have more work so I can earn more money.

* **Prompt:** Approve
 * **Chief:** I see, then I'll increase your missions moderately. I'll also adjust your remuneration according to your performance.
 * **Chief:** I don't want my Sinners to worry about this kind of thing.
 * **Macchiato:** Oh? Really? Thank you, Chief.
 * **Macchiato:** I'm not sure how I can repay you... All I can do is this.
 * **System Notifications:** Macchiato takes out her lash.
 * **Chief:** Hold on... No!
 * **Macchiato:** Don't defy your true thoughts. Face your master!
 * **System Notifications:** Bamâ€”
 * **Chief:** It hurts! Though it feels a little funny, it really hurts.

* **Prompt:** Give Macchiato a subsidy
 * **Chief:** How about I give you a one-off subsidy to cover your family's expenses?
 * **Chief:** I want my Sinners to be free of worries.
 * **Macchiato:** Oh? Really? Thank you, Chief.
 * **Macchiato:** I'm not sure how I can repay you... All I can do is this.
 * **System Notifications:** Macchiato takes out her lash.
 * **Chief:** Hold on... No!
 * **Macchiato:** Don't defy your true thoughts. Face your master!
 * **System Notifications:** Bamâ€”
 * **Chief:** It hurts! Though it feels a little funny, it really hurts.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
Hi, I'm Macchiato, client manager at Eastside Bank. Would you like to try our program... ah, you're the Chief here? My apologies, I subconsciously spew these lines whenever I meet someone new. I will definitely cooperate with you.

[Raise to Phase 1]
Is this what you wanted? I see. I will satisfy you.

[Raise to Phase 3]
Get ready for an unprecedented feast for the senses.

[Level Start]
I will give everyone the motivation to keep going.

[Win Battles]
My hand is sore... but I'm very happy.

[Lose Battles]
What do I do, it's over... I'm going to die...

[Ultimate Skill]
Feel the joy with your heart...

[Die in Battles]
I can't die... I still have to...

[Greeting]
Chief, you're back? I put yesterday's work report on your desk already. Would you like something to drink? Coffee, tea or something else? I'll prepare it for you.

[Conversation 1]
Physical pain is short-lived, but mental pleasure brings long-lasting satisfactionâ€”â€”or so they say. Would you like to try it?

[Conversation 2]
Eastside Bank's new wealth management program is superb! It's low-risk, high-return and boasts an annualized return of 12%. I joined it myself. Chief, are you really not going to consider it?

[Conversation 3]
It's good to have a nine-to-five job. This way, I'll have enough time to pursue my "hobbies".

[Special Conversation 1]
When my younger siblings get jobs, I will truly be free. When that day comes, I want to become a truck driver in Sandsea, or a rock drummer in the Syndicate... as long as I can leave Eastside.

[Special Conversation 2]
Life in Eastside is too depressing. Sales quotas, debts, stocks, emotions... Everyone has countless things to worry about. Maybe that's why they need me.

[Special Conversation 3]
This might sound a bit ungrateful, but I dislike the title "Dominatrix"... However, if it's what you desire, Chief, I'm willing to be your personal dominatrix.

[Full Compliance]
In the past, I somewhat resisted this power and identity. But ever since you showed up, I realized that satisfaction truly does exist... perhaps I'm addicted to you, dear Chief.

[Idle]
Welcome to Eastside Bank! Oh, I mean MBCC... sorry, I was dozing off just now.

[Annoyed]
If you're really stressed, I can help you destress.

[Special Attention]
I've never been secretary before. What do I need to do? Is satisfying all of your needs enough?

[Dispatch]
I will complete this mission for sure.

[Dispatch Complete]
Mission accomplished. Who do I find to write off the expenses?

[Level Up]
Thank you for your support.
nightmareTalent: All allied units: Take 10% less Damage.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Endless Cravings
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When an enemy with [Torture] dies, all the allies recover 3%/4%/5% of their Max HP.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText: "I think... I'm used to it already."

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Hope + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Helps Macchiato get her first Ult up quickly.

crimebrandSets.name: Tuning + Paradise
crimebrandSets.note: Adds extra corebreak if the team needs it.

crimebrandSets.name: Justice + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Increase team's Atk when Macchiato ults.

crimebrandSets.name: Afterglow + Corridor
crimebrandSets.note: Boosts nearby allied Sinners' Attack by 10% after Macchiato uses Ult. Although the Attack increase provided is larger than Justice, Afterglow does not apply mapwide, making it more difficult to use than Justice.

guide.title: Summary
guide.text:
Macchiato is very cheap to build, needing only lvl 40 P2 and no skill level investment due to her healing scaling off the allied Sinner's rather than her own Attack stat.

Although Macchiato can be sufficient in stages where there are less enemies/boss stages as it is easier for her to apply [Torture] without having to move her around everywhere, she lacks AoE healing outside of allies NAing marked enemies and can struggle to keep slow Atkspd Sinners alive VS AoE dmg.

cons: Enemies must be marked by her NA for healing

shackles.title: Delayed Gratification
shackles.description: [Motivate] State duration is extended by 4 seconds.

shackles.title: Delight
shackles.description: While [Motivated], recovers 3% of Max HP upon taking damage.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Lash
skills.description: Macchiato attacks enemies with her whip, dealing (80% of Attack) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Motivating Whip
skills.description: Macchiato lashes an allied Sinner, making them [Motivated] for 10 seconds. While [Motivated], the Sinner restores 3.5% of Max HP.

skills.name: Double the Torture
skills.description: When dealing damage to enemies, Macchiato gives them [Torture]. Any allied Sinner hitting an enemy with [Torture] restores 1% of Max HP.

skills.name: Pain Normalization
skills.description: When [Motivated], the Sinner receives an extra 15% damage reduction bonus.

compliance: Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Life +38, Magic Resistance +3
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, Life +38, Magic Resistance +3 Unlocking Conditions: Dispatch Macchiato 10 times
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlocking Condition: Macchiato's Shackle synchronization rate increased to 5
Unlock Voice: Full Obedience, Unlock Sinner Title: Sweet Pain
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Sure, if that's what you need, I'll raise the whip for you again... to satisfy the deepest desire within you.

[Greeting]
Do you want a reward from me too? That's all right, don't be shy.. I will accept every side of you.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Sure you can't go on? Hang in there a little longer. I promise to take you to heaven at just the right moment... Trust me... I know your limits quite well.

[Ordinary Contact 2]
Here, open your mouth. This is your reward for being obedient and cooperative... Let's enjoy it together.

[Idle] 
Ah... Very nice, everyone is sated...

[Annoyed]
Are you so eager? Then get into position, and don't move around...

[Special Attention] 
If you want it, just nod, and I'll show you... the sweetest reward.

[Level Up}
How about that? Do you feel light as a feather now?
